channel.title: Uninstall on Crunchy Data PostgreSQL Operator Playbooks
channel.description: Recent content in Uninstall on Crunchy Data PostgreSQL Operator Playbooks

item.title: Uninstalling Metrics Stack
item.description: Uninstalling the Metrics Stack The following assumes the proper prerequisites are satisfied we can now deprovision the PostgreSQL Operator. First, it is recommended to use the playbooks tagged with the same version of the Metrics stack currently deployed. With the correct playbooks acquired and prerequisites satisfied, simply run the following command: ansible-playbook -i /path/to/inventory main.yml --tags=deprovision-metrics

item.title: Uninstalling PostgreSQL Operator
item.description: Uninstalling PostgreSQL Operator The following assumes the proper prerequisites are satisfied we can now deprovision the PostgreSQL Operator. First, it is recommended to use the playbooks tagged with the same version of the PostgreSQL Operator currently deployed. With the correct playbooks acquired and prerequisites satisfied, simply run the following command: ansible-playbook -i /path/to/inventory main.yml --tags=deprovision Deleting pgo Client To remove the pgo client, simply run the following command: rm /usr/local/bin/pgo
